CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, Sep. 24, 1955, pg. 6 reads: "Scholarship Winners - Six District boys and girls were awarded State Senatorial Scholarships at a dinner and dance and testimonial to David E. Glavin, deputy secretary of Labor and Industry for Pennsylvania, which was held at the Hotel William Penn, Saturday night...Henry R. Davis, 1236 Hazlett Road, R.D.I, Allison Park; David Brutz, 473 Robinson Court, and Ronald F. Schaming, 424 Brinwood Avenue...Messrs, Schaming, Brutz and Davis...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ronald F. Schaming, David Brutz, and Henry R. Davis, seated at banquet table for State Senatorial Scholarship awards dinner
